lyricsShona:
1. Mwari taungana
Muhutsvene hweNyu
Nemufaro, zvatapinda
Muhumambo hweNyu

2. Iwo mwoyo wangu
Unokufarirai
Nawo mweya wangu Mwari
Uno kufarirai

3. Ese mazwi eNyu
Mwari ngandi anzwe
Razarura izwi reNyu
Zvese ngandi zvinzwe

4. Ndisimbisei Mwari
Ini mwana weNyu
Ndazoenda ndigofara
Mudenga reNyu

NARINI
Runoimbwa:
• Nemusi we Muvhuro
• Pakukumbirira mvura pa Chikoho
• Nemusi we Chipiri
• Nemusi we China
• Pakurapiwa kwevanhu vasina kupfeka Guta
• Pakuropafadzwa kwezvipfeko
lyricsNdebele:
1. Thixo sihlangene
Ebungcweleni bakho
Ngokuthaba sengingene
Embusweni wakho

2. Inhliziyo yami
Iya kuthabela
Lawo umphe fum’lo wami
Uya kuthabela

3. Wonk’ amazwi akho
Thixo kangi wezwe
Nxa kwe mbula izwi lakho
Konke kangikuzwe

4. Ngiqinise Thixo
Mina mtwana wakho
Ekuhambeni ngijabule
Ezulwini lakho

Lanini
Ihlatshelwa:
• Ngolwesibili
• Ngolwesine
• Ngokwelatshwa kwa bantu abanga gqokanga iguta
• Kubusiswa izembatho (idonswa)
lyricsTswana:
1. Modimo re kopanye
Mo boitshepong jwa Gago
Ka boitumelo re tsenye
Mo pusong ya Gago.

2. Pelo ya me
E a go itumelela
Le one mowa wa me
O a go itumelela.

3. Otlhe mantswe a Gago
Modimo ke a utlwe
Fa lentswe la Gago le senola
Gotlhe ke go utlwe.

4. Ntiise Modimo
Nna ngwana wa Gago
Mo go tsamayeng ke itumele
Mo legodimong la Gago.

KA BOSAKUTLENG.
Malatsi a pina e e opelwang ka one:
• Tirelo ya kalafi ya Mosupologo
• Tirelo ya kalafi ya Labobedi
• Fa go alafiwa ba ba sa aparang Guta.
• Labone ka tirelo ya ga Janet
• Modimo re kopanye ke nngwe ya dipina tse di oplelwang fa go kopelwa pula ka Thobo
• Ka nako ya kapeso ya Seaparo se se Boitshepo

lyricsShona:
1. Tirivawadzani, tirivawadzani
Vana veNyu Mwari Musiki
Dai tichidana, dai tichidana
Tisave neshanje tirivatsvene

2. Tinoyamurana, tinoyamurana
Vatsvene vemusha wehutsvene
Tisatsaukane, tisatsaukane
Hazviitwe muGuta Ra Mwari (Zvimiso)

3. Tiri hondo imwe, tiri hondo imwe
Mbirimi dza Mwari Musiki
Ngatizvirwireyi nemoyo mumwe
Hamuna hugwara muGuta Ra Mwari (Zvimiso)

4. Pakufara kwedu tese mudenga
Tinorumbidza ivo Mwari Musiki
Naiwo masimba eMweya mutsvene
Atakasvika nawo mudenga

NARINI
Runoimbwa:
• Pamisangano yese yevatakuri vebasa
• Pakupera kwe rushando rwaJanet
lyricsNdebele:
1. Singabazalwane, singabazalwane
Bantwana baka Nkulunkulu
Kuhle sithandane, kuhle sithandane
Singabi lomona sibangcwele

2. Singabasizani, singabasizani
Bangcwele bekhaya elingcwele
Kasingehlukani, kasingehlukani
Akwenziwa njalo eGuta Ra Mwari (Zvimiso)

3. Silibutho linye, silibutho linye
Maqhawe aka Nkulunkulu
Kuhle sizilwele ngenhliziyo yinye
Kabukho bugwala eGuta Ra Mwari (Zvimiso)

4. Ekujabuleni, sonke ezulwini
Sidumisa yena uNkulunkulu
Kungawo amandla kaMoya oyingcwele
Esafika ngawo ezulwini

LANINI
Ihlatshelwa:
• Nge mihlangano yonke yabathwali bomsebenzi
• Ekupheleni kwe nkonzo ka Janet
lyricsTswana:
1. Re ditsala mmogo, re ditsala mmogo
Bana ba Gago Modimo
Go go ntle re ratana, go go ntle re ratana
Re se nne lefufa re Boitshepo

2. Re ba ba thusanang, re ba ba thusanang
Ba ba boitshepo ba legae le Boitshepo
Re se ka ra kgaogana, re se ka ra kgaogana
Ga go dirwe jalo mo Guta Ra Mwari (Zvimiso)

3. Re mophato o mongwe, re mophato o mongwe
Bagaka ba Gagwe Modimo
Go go ntle re itwela ka pelo nngwe
Ga go na bogatapa mo Guta Ra Mwari (Zvimiso)

4. Mo boitumelong rotlhe mo legodimong
Re godisa ene Modimo
Ka thata ya Mowa o o Boitshepo
O re gorogileng ka one mo legodimong

KA BOSAKUTLENG
Malatsi a pina e e opelwang ka one:
• Pina e oplelwa pele ga go simololwa phuthego
• Kwa pheletso ya tirelo ya ga Janet

lyricsShona:
1. Mwari vadzoka ku Zororo
Mweya wehupenyu
Ndichadzoka saizvozvi
Ini ndinobvuma

2. Chivimbiso chinofadza
Zvirevo zvazadziswa
Makumi mana emazuva
Mwari vave mhiri

3. Ngandi vafarirei Mwari Musiki
Mwari nechokwadi
Vanogara nevanobvuma
Ngandi varumbidze

4. Vanoti “Ndini Mwari Musiki”
Izwi rinodaro
Vano rova neku vadzinga
Vanosara murima

5. Vazhinji vano kundikana
Neshungu dzeshanje
Havazive zvino rehwa
“Handi garwe nhaka”

6. Ndinerombo ndakasarudzwa
Kugara na Mwari
Ndino famba muchaedza
Handizo gumburwi

7. Mwari Musiki pasi rese
Vari mu Africa
Iwe ibva kuvakaenda
Huya uponeswe

8. Mwari ndivo vanotuma
Iwo mweya Mutsvene
Idzidziso kumarudzi
Nga auye wo atumwe

NARINI
Runoimbwa:
• Parushando rwe Chishanu rwemanheru
• Pa Chivimbiso
• Pakugamuchira Gomo
lyricsNdebele:
1. Nkulunkulu uphendukile
Ngumoya wempilo
Ngizabuya lami njalo
Mina engivumayo

2. Isithembiso siyajabulisa
Amazwi agcwaliswe
“Amashumi mane ezinsuku”
Thixo uphetsheya

3. Kangimthabele Thixo Mdali
Thixo ngeqiniso
Uhlala labavumayo
Kangimdumise

4. Uthi “Yimi Thixo Mdali”
Izwi litsho njalo
Bayamtshaya lokumxotsha
Basala emnyameni

5. Abanengi bayehluleka
Ngenxa yobukhwele
Kabakwazi akutshiwo
“Kangidliwa lifa”

6. Ngilenhlanhla ngakhethelwa
Ukuhlala lo Thixo
Ngiyahamba ekukhanyeni
Kangikhubeki

7. Thixo Mdali amazwe wonke
Ukhona e Africa
Wena phuma kwabahamayo
Woza usindiswe

8. Nkulunkulu nguy’othuma
Umoya oyingcwele
Imfundiso ezizweni
Kuzibuyiswe zithunywe

LANINI
Ihlatshelwa:
• Ngenkonzo yangolwesihlanu
• Nge Sithembiso
• Nxa kuhlangabezwa iNtaba
• Ngomgqibelo ekuseni
lyricsTswana:
1. Modimo o boile boikhutsong
Ke mowa wa botshelo
Le nna ke boa jalo
Nna yo ke dumelang

2. Tsholofetso e a itumedisa
Mantswe a tladitswe
Masome mane a malatsi
Modimo o boseja

3. A ke mo itumelele Modimo Mmopi
Modimo ka nnete
O nna le ba ba mo dumelang
A ke mo godise

4. A re “ke nna Modimo Mmopi”
Ke lentswe la rialo
Ba mo itaya le go mo alola
Ba setse lefifing

5. Bontsi bo a palelwa
Ka ntlha ya lefufa
Ga ba itse se se boletsweng
“Ga ke jewe boswa”

6. Ke na le tshegofatso ke tlhophilwe
Go nna le Modimo
Ke tsamaya mo leseding
Ga ke kgopisege

7. Modimo Mmopi mafatshe otlhe
O gone Africa
Tswa wena mo go ba ba tsamaileng
Tla o tshedisiwe

8. Modimo ke ene a romang
Mowa o Boitshepo
Thuto mo ditshabeng
E tle e romiwe

KA BOSAKUTLENG
Malatsi a pina e e opelwang ka one:
• Tirelo ya Labotlhano
• Ka mokopano wa Tsholofetso

titleTswana: GUTA RA MWARI LEGAE LA ME
lyricsShona:
1. Guta Ra Mwari musha wangu
Uyu wandinoda
Sezvo ndapedza mabasa
Ndinogara muno

2. Hongu ndinogara muno
Musha we ruponeso
Unedzimba dzakanaka
Nekudya kutsvene

3. Musha usina kuipa
Hauna nenhamo
Musha uyu une mufaro
Musha wehutsvene

4. Chii chingandivhundutsa
Hurwere kana kuenda
Kwete ndinogara muno
Musha wandinoda

5. Vazhinji vakazvipira
Vakagara muna Mwari
Varipo pamwe na Mwari
Neni ndazvipira

6. Guta ra Mwari musha wangu
Uyu we Zvimiso
Ndakasvika mumusha
Ndinofara ini

NARINI
Runoimbwa:
• Parushando rwekurapiwa
• Pakurapiwa nerumbo kana pasina Mutumwa anorapa neruoko
• Pakutangisa nekupera kwerwendo
• Pakugamuchira nekuperekedza mawuto
• Pakuropafadzwa kwechipo chakaita semotokari, imba nezvimwe zvakadaro
lyricsNdebele:
1. Guta Ra Mwari khaya lami
Engilithandayo
Sengi qed’ imisebenzi
Ngizahlala kilo

2. Yebo ngizahlala khona
Umzi wosindiso
Ulaz’ izindlu ezinhle
Lokudla okungcwele

3. Umuzi ongelabubi
Kawulaludubo
Likhaya elenjabulo
Ngumuzi wobungcwele

4. Kuyini okungangethusa
Isifo lokuhamba
Hatshi ngiyahlala kuwo
Umzengiwu thandayo

5. Abanengi bazinikela
Bahlala kuThixo
Bandawonye loNkulunkulu
Lami ngizinikele

6. Guta Ra Mwari khaya lami
Leli le Zvimiso
Sengafika lapha ekhaya
Ngiyathaba mina

LANINI
Ihlatshelwa:
• Ngenkonzo yokwelatshwa ngengoma
• Nxa kuhlangabezwa amabutho lokuvalelisa
• Ekuqaleni lasekucineni kohambo
• Ekubusisweni kwezipho ezinjengezimota lezindlu
lyricsTswana:
1. Guta Ra Mwari legae la me
Le ke le ratang
Ke feditse ditiro
Ke nna gone

2. Ee, ke nna gone
Motse wa poloko
O na le matlo a mantle
Dijo di Boitshepo

3. Motse o o senang bobe
Ga o na matshwenyego
Ke legae la boitumelo
Ke motse o o Boitshepo

4. Ke eng se se ka ntshosang
Bolwetse le go tsamaya
Nnyaa ke nna gone
Legae le ke le ratang

5. Ba le bantsi ba ineetse
Ba nna le Modimo
Ba mmogo le Modimo
Le nna ke ineetse

6. Guta Ra Mwari legae la me
Le la Dikemiso
Ke gorogile mo gae
Ke a itumela

KA BOSAKUTLENG
Malatsi a pina e opelwang ka one:
• Mo tirelong nngwe le nngwe fa go sena Morongwa o alafang ka seatla
• Mo ditirelong tsotlhe tsa kalafi
• Go amogelwa ga masole fa a goroga le fa a tsamaya
• Fa go segofadiwa dimpho tse di tshwanang le dikoloi le matlo
• Kwa tshimologong le phelelo ya mosepele

lyricsShona:
1. Munodzima kuipa Mwari
Kwakanaka wandisisa
Munopedza mhosva Mwari
Nekunetswa kweNyu

2. Muri nzira inetsitsi
Isiri yeshanje
Munonetswa neveshanje
Makanyararira

3. Nazvo zvivi zvangu zvese
Zvinodzimwa neMi
Nedzo mhaka dzangu dzese
Dzinodzimwa neMi

4. Ndino regererwa ndichiponeswa
Nemarwadzo eNyu
Ndinoshambwa zvakaipa
Naiwo Mweya weNyu

NARINI
Runoimbwa:
• Parushando rweSvondo mangwanani (ruchidhonzwa) nemasikati
• Parushando rwemusi weMugovera masikati
• Pakukumbirira mvura paChikoho
• Pakuperekedza Gomo
• Pakuridza ngoma panenge pachiparidzirwa vanhu (Vhuserere)
lyricsNdebele:
1. Uyesul’ izono Thixo
Ezinengi nengi
Uyaqedi’ icala Thixo
Ngokuhlutshwa kwakho

2. Uyindlela yesihawu
Engasi yomon’a
Baya kuhlupha abomona
Uzithulele zwi

3. Laz’izono zami zonke
Ziyacitshwa nguwe
Lemi landu yami yonke
Uyicitsha yonke

4. Ngixolelwa ngiphiliswa
Ngobuhlungu bakho
Ngiyahlanzwa ezonweni
Ngawo umoya wakho

LANINI
Ihlatshelwa:
• Ngenkonzo yangoMgqibelo emini
• NgeSonto ekuseni lasemini
• Nxa kutshaywa ingungu kuhanjwa
• NgeSivuno nxa kucelelwa izulu
• Nxa kuphelekezelwa iNtaba
lyricsTswana:
1. O phimotse dibe Modimo
Tse dintsi-ntsi
O a phimola molato Modimo
Ka go tshwenngwa ga Gago

2. O tsela ya kutlwelo botlhoko
E e seng ya lefufa
Ba a go tshwenya ba lefufa
O itidimaletse

3. Le dibe tsa me tsotlhe
Di phimotswe ke Wena
Le melato ya me yotlhe
O e phimotse yotlhe

4. Ke itshwarelwa ke tshedisiwa
Ka botlhoko ja Gago
Ke a tlhatswiwa mo dibeng
Ka mowa wa Gago

KA BOSAKUTLENG
Malatsi a pina e opelwang ka one:
• Mo tirelong e feletseng ya Matlhatso motshegare
• Mo tirelong ya Tshipi mo mosong le motshegare
• Fa Thaba e tsamaya morago ga go etela lefelo
• Fa go kopiwa pula
• Fa go letswa meropa go alafiwa lefatshe ka go tsamaya mo mafelong a farologanyeng

lyricsShona:
1. Ini mwana weNyu Mwari
Mune dzese nguva
Munondichengeta imi
Pane nzvimbo dzese

2. Kana ndoyambuka nzizi
Muneni imi Mwari
Kana ndopomerwa nhema
Muneni imi Mwari

3. Apo pandinotambudzwa
Ndinosimbiswa neMi
Nepane zvinondiruma
Ndinochengetwa neMi

4. Ndatove munhu wechokwadi
Ndato kunda mhandu
Ndinovimba neMi Mwari
Mundichengetedze

5. Ndidzidewo tsika dzeNyu
Ndidzichengetedze
Ndiyide yese mirairo
Ndiyichengetedze

6. Ndizvivenge izvo zvese
Zvinovengwa neMi
Ndizvidewo izvo zvese
Zvinodiwa neMi

7. Ndinodaro ini mwana
Naro simba reNyu
Ndinosimbiswa nekushingiswa
Nawo Mweya weNyu

8. Ndatarira imi Mwari
Ini mwana weNyu
Ndinobvuma nekuvimba
Nechokwadi chese

NARINI
Runoimbwa:
• Parushando rwevakomana nevasikana
• Parushando rwekutanga kana zvikoro zvavharwa
• Parushando rwekupedzisira kana vana vakudzokera kuzvikoro
• Mamwe mazuva runoimbwa kusvika pandima yechina chete
lyricsNdebele:
1. Mina mntwana wakho Thixo
Ngezikhathi zonke
Ungigcina ungisiza
Endaweni zonke

2. Nxa ngiwela imifula
Uba lami Thixo
Nxa ngifakazelwa amanga
Uba lami Thixo

3. Lapho ngikhathazwa khona
Ngiqiniswa nguwe
Lasezilwaneni Thixo
Ngiqiniswa nguwe

4. Nginguye umntwana oqotho
Senginqobe izitha
Ngithembele kuwe Thixo
Ungilondoloze

5. Ngilithanda isiko lakho
Ngiligcine lona
Ngiyithande imithetho
Ngiyigcine yona

6. Ngizonde lokho konke
Okuzondwa nguwe
Ngizithande izinto zonke
Ezithandwa nguwe

7. Ngenze njalo mina mntwana
Ngamandla akho
Ngiqiniswa ngikhuthazwa
Ngomoya wakho

8. Ngikhangele kuwe Thixo
Mina mntwana wakho
Ngiyavuma ngikwethembe
Ngeqiniso lonke

LANINI
Ihlatshelwa:
• Ngenkonzo yamankazana labafana
lyricsTswana:
1. Nna ngwana wa Gago Modimo
Ka dinako tsotlhe
O ntlhokomela o ntshetsa
Mafelong otlhe

2. Fa ke tshela melapo
O na le nna Modimo
Fa ke supelwa maaka
O na le nna Modimo

3. Fa ke tshwenngwa teng
Ke tiisiwa ke Wena
Le mo direng Modimo
Ke tlhokomelwa ke Wena

4. Ke ngwana wa boammaruri
Ke fentse dira
Ke ikanya wena Modimo
O mpabaletse

5. Ke rata tsela ya Gago
Ke e babalela
Ke rata melao yotlhe
Ke e babalela

6. Ke ila tsotlhe
Tse di ilwang ke Wena
Ke rata tsotlhe
Tse di ratwang ke Wena

7. Ntire jalo nna ngwana
Ka thata ya Gago
Ke tiisiwa ke kgothatswa
Ke mowa wa Gago

8. Ke lebelela wena Modimo
Nna ngwana wa Gago
Ke a dumela ke go tshepile
Ka boammaruri jotlhe

KA BOSAKUTLENG
Malatsi a pina e opelwang ka one:
• Ka tirelo ya bana makolwane le makgarejwana
• E opelwa mo tirelong ya ntlha fa bana ba tswetse dikolo
• Le mo tirelong ya bofelo fa dikolo di bulwa
• Mo malatsing mangwe e opelwa go fitlha temana ya bone fela

lyricsShona:
1. Zadzisai izwi reNyu
Mwari mundisimbise
Dzese ndudzi dzese nyika
Ngadziwane ruponeso

2. Namabvi enenyika
Ngaapfugame mberi kweNyu
Dzidzamare dzese nyika
Dzitaure mbiri yeNyu

3. Tongai, tongai Mwari Musiki
Kunouya nemi kufara
Nezvikanganiso zvavo
Yayipa yese nyika

4. Tarirai nyika yaparara
Regererai zvivi zvayo
Dzese nyika dzawora
Nekuenda kwevanhu vadzo

5. Rayai Mwari ndisanete
Idzidziso yezwi reNyu
Mweya weNyu ngawuwande
Ndudzi dzese dziponeswe

NARINI
Runoimbwa:
• Pakukumbirira nyika kuti matambudziko apedzwe
• Pakukumbira mvura paChikoho
lyricsNdebele:
1. Ligcwalise izwi lakho
Nkulunkulu ngiqinise
Zonk’ inhlanga, zonk’ izizwe
Kazizuze usindiso

2. Amadolo kulelizwe
Kawaguqe phambi kwakho
Ukuze wonke amazwe
Akhulume udumo lwakho

3. Busa, busa Thixo Mdali
Kuza ngawe ukuthaba
Ngeziphithiphithi zabo
Wonakele wonk’ umhlaba

4. Bona umhlaba wonakele
Thethelela izono zabo
Wonk’ amazwe sebolile
Ngokuhamba kwabantu

5. Yala Thixo ngingadeli
Imfundiso yezwi lakho
Umoya wakho uvame
Izizwe zonke zisindiswe

LANINI
Ihlatshelwa:
• Nxa kucelelwa umhlaba
• Nge Sivuno nxa kucelelwa izulu
lyricsTswana:
1. Le tlatse lentswe la Gago
Modimo o ntiise
Mafelo otlhe, ditshaba tsotlhe
A di amogele poloko

2. Mangole mo lefatsheng
A a khubame fa pele Gago
Gore mafatshe otlhe
A bue bogolo jwa Gago

3. Busa, busa Modimo Mmopi
Bo tla ka Wena boitumelo
Ka tlhakatlhakano ya bone
Le senyegile lefatshe

4. Leba lefatshe le senyegile
Itshwarele dibe tsa lone
Mafatshe otlhe a senyegile
Ka go tsamaya ga batho

5. Laola Modimo ke se lape
Thuto ya lentswe la Gago
Mowa wa Gago a o ate
Ditshaba tsotlhe di bolokwe

KA BOSAKUTLENG
Malatsi a pina e opelwang ka one:
• Fa go kopelwa lefatshe gore matshwenyego a fedisiwe
• Fa go kopelwa pula ka Thobo

lyricsShona:
1. Mwari ndiri mwana weNyu
Ndakazvitadzira
Ndinochema mberi kweNyu
Mwari ndiregererei

2. Zvitadzo zvangu zvizhinji
Hazvingaverengwi
Ndinozviisa kwaMuri
Mwari ndiregererei

3. Mirawo ndakaityora
Imi ndakakuzvidzai
Muponesi ndakarasika
Mwari ndiregererei

4. Ndakatadza nekureva
Kutadza nekufunga
Ndakatadza nekurarama
Mwari ndiregererei

5. Nepo pandakafanira
Kukurumbidzai
Ndakatadza nemabasa
Mwari ndiregererei

6. Nazvo zvitadzo zvizhinji
Ndakazvitadzira
Ini ndakazvinyadzisa
Mwari ndiregererei

7. Mwari Musiki munengoni
Dzisingaperi
Naizvozvo ndinochema
Mwari ndiregererei

NARINI
Runoimbwa:
• Mushure mekurapiwa kwevatsvene
• Panguva yekugamuchirwa kwevanhu vatsva mu Guta Ra Mwari (Zvimiso)
lyricsNdebele:
1. Thixo ngingu mntwana wakho
Mina ngazonela
Ngiyakhala phambi kwakho
Thixo ngithethelela

2. Izono zami zinengi
Kazila kubalwa
Lokho ngiziletha kuwe
Thixo ngithethelela

3. Imithetho ngayiphula
Wena ngakudela
Msindisi bengilahlekile
Thixo ngithethelela

4. Ngona ngayo inkulumo
Ngona ngomcabango
Ngona langemisebenzi
Thixo ngithethelela

5. Lokho engangingafanele
Ukukubabaza
Ngona ngokukulibala
Thixo ngithethelela

6. Ngazizono ezinengi
Ngazo ngazonela
Mina qobo ngazihlazisa
Thixo ngithethelela

7. Nkulunkulu ulomusa
Ongasoze uphele
Ngakho ngiyakhala ngithi
Thixo ngithethelela

LANINI
Ihlatshelwa:
• Nxa kusemukelwa abantu abatsha abazinikeleyo
lyricsTswana:
1. Modimo ke ngwana wa Gago
Ke itshenyeditse
Ke a lela pela Gago
Modimo intshwarele

2. Maleo a me a mantsi
Ga a ka ke a balwa
Ke a tlisa go Wena
Modimo intshwarele

3. Melao ke e sentse
Wena ke go tlogetse
Mmoloki ke ne ke latlhegile
Modimo intshwarele

4. Ke fositse ka go akanya
Le ka go bua
Ke sentse le ka ditiro
Modimo intshwarele

5. Fa ke ne ke tshwanetse
Go go godisa
Ke fositse ka go lebala
Modimo intshwarele

6. Ka tsone dibe tse dintsi
Ke itshenyeditse
Nna ka bo nna ke inyaditse
Modimo intshwarele

7. Modimo o pelo tlhomogi
E e sa feleng
Ka moo ke a lela ka re
Modimo intshwarele

KA BOSAKUTLENG
Malatsi a pina e opelwang ka one:
• Mo tirelong nngwe le nngwe fa go amogelwa molwetse yo mosha mo Guta Ra Mwari (Zvimiso)

lyricsShona:
1. Vabereki ne vana
Huyai kuna Mwari
Musaterere dzidziso
yekutevedzera
Mu Zvimiso mune chokwadi
Huyai muponiswe
Hunzai mitoro yenyu kuna Mwari

2. “Ndinokugamuchirai
Ndino kukumbundirai
Ndiri ini Mufudzi wenyu
Musazvitutumadze
Ndinoda vanhu vese
Ndizovapa hupenyu
Hunzai mitoro yenyu kwandiri”

3. Mwari vane tsitsi
Vanoropafadza
Vanhu vazhinji-zhinji
Vasati vaziva
Havana dzidziso chaiyo
Havanzwi izwi ravo
Hunzai mitoro yenyu kuna Mwari

4. Ndino kunamatai
Kuti marudzi ese
Asiye zvifananidzo
Auye kwaMuri
Muva vhenekere Mwari
Muve navo muhupenyu
Muva dzidzise vauye kwaMuri

NARINI
Runoimbwa:
• Pakupera kwerushando rwemusi weChipiri manheru kana kusina musangano zuva iroro
lyricsNdebele:
1. Bazali labantwana
Buyani ku Thixo
Lingalaleli imfundiso
yokulingisela
E Zimisweni kuleqiniso
Buyanini lisindiswe
Lethani imithwalo yenu ku Thixo

2. “Ngiyalemukela
Ngilibambe ngesandla
Nginguye uMelusi wenu
Lingagabazi
Ngifuna abantu bonke
Ngizobanika impilo
Lethani imithwalo yenu ku Thixo”

3. UThixo umnene
Ulakho ukubusisa
Abantu abanengi
Abangakamazi
Kabala mfundiso eqotho
Kabazwa ilizwi lakhe
Lethani imithwalo yenu ku Thixo

4. Ngiyakukhuleka
Ukuba izizwe zonke
Zitshiye izithombe zazo
Zibuye ngakuwe
Uzikhanyisele Thixo
Ube lazo empilweni
Uzifundise zibuye ngakuwe

LANINI
Ihlatshelwa:
• Ngolwesibili ntambama inkonzo isivalwa
• NgoMvulo ntambama
lyricsTswana:
1. Batsadi le bana
Tlang go Modimo
Lo se ka lwa reetsa thuto
Ya go tshwantsha
Mo Guta Ra Mwari (Zvimiso) go boammaruri
Tlang lo tshedisiwe
Lereng merwalo ya lona go Modimo

2. “Ke a lo amogela
Ke lo tshware ka seatla
Ke nna Modisa wa lona
Lo se ikgantshe
Ke batla batho botlhe
Go tla go ba neeela botshelo
Lereng merwalo ya lona kwa go Nna”

3. Modimo o pelonomi
O na le go segofatsa
Batho ba bantsi
Ba ba sa Mo itseng
Ga ba na thuto ya nnete
Ga ba utlwe puo ya Gago
Lereng merwalo ya lona go Modimo

4. Ke a rapela
Gore ditshaba tsotlhe
Di lese ditshwantsho tsa tsone
Di tle kwa go Wena
O di bonesetse Modimo
O nne le tsone botshelong
O di ruthe di tle go Wena

KA BOSAKUTLENG
Malatsi a pina e opelwang ka one:
• Mo tirelong ya Labobedi fa go sena go tswalwa tirelo ya maitseboa

lyricsShona:
1. Tinodyara mbeu, mbeu yakanaka
Mangwanani, masikati, nemanheru
Tazomirira nguva yekukohwa
Tinozofara tatakura tswanda

CHORUS:
Tatakura tswanda x2
Tinozofara tatakura tswanda
Tatakura tswanda x2
Tinozofara tatakura tswanda

2. Tinodyara muzuva nemumvuri
Hatizoitya mhute yemuchando
Tinozoripedza pamberi basa
Tinozofara tatakura tswanda

(CHORUS)

3. Tinovaka Guta, musha wekuguma
Guta Ra Mwari, musha wevatsvene
Ngatipakatei titakure basa
Tinozofara kana takunda

(CHORUS)

NARINI
Runoimbwa:
• Panguva yeChikoho
lyricsNdebele:
1. Sihlanyela inhlanyelo yokulunga
Ekuseni, emini, lantambama
Sesimele isikhathi sokuvuna
Siyathokoza sithwel’ izinyanda

CHORUS:
Sithweli nyanda x2
Siyathokoza sithwel’ izinyanda
Sithweli nyanda x2
Siyathokoza sithwel’ izinyanda

2. Sihlanyela elangeni lemthunzini
Kasesabi inkungu yobusika
Sizawuqeda phambili umsebenzi
Siyathokoza sithweli nyanda

3. Sakha iGuta, muzi wophephelo
Guta Ra Mwari, muzi wabangcwele
Asihlomenini sithwal’ umsebenzi
Siyathokoza nxa sesinqobile

LANINI
Ihlatshelwa:
• Ngesikhathi seSivuno
lyricsTswana:
1. Re jala peo ya tshiamo
Mo mosong, motshegare le maitseboa
Re emetse nako ya Thobo
Re tla itumela re rora diako

CHORUS:
Re rora diako x2
Re tla itumela re rora diako
Re rora diako
Re tla itumela re rora diako

2. Re jala letsatsing le mo moriting
Ga re tshabe mouwane wa dikgakologo
Re tla e fetsa kwa pele tiro
Re tla itumela fa re fentse

3. Re aga Guta, motse wa botshabelo
Guta Ra Mwari, motse wa baitshepi
A re ipaneng re rwale tiro
Re tla itumela fa re fentse

KA BOSAKUTLENG
Malatsi a pina e opelwang ka one:
• Mo tirelong ya Thobo ka nako ya dimpho

lyricsShona:
Pachikoho faraiwo mose farai
Tayambuka
Faraiwo mose farai
Chifaraiwo mose pachikoho x2

Vasikana, faraiwo mose farai
Vakomana, faraiwo mose farai
Chifaraiwo mose pachikoho x2

Vanamai, faraiwo mose farai
Vanababa, faraiwo mose farai
Chifaraiwo mose pachikoho x2

NARINI
Runoimbwa:
• Panguva yeChikoho
lyricsNdebele:
NgeSivuno thabanini lonke thabani
Sesichaphile
Thabanini lonke thabani
Thabanini lonke ngeSivuno

Mankazana, thabanini lonke thabani
Bafana, thabanini lonke thabani
Thabanini lonke ngeSivuno

Bomama, thabanini lonke thabani
Bobaba, thabanini lonke thabani
Thabanini lonke ngeSivuno

LANINI
Ihlatshelwa:
• Ngesikhathi seSivuno
lyricsTswana:
Ka Thobo re itumele rotlhe, re itumele
Re fentse
Re itumele rotlhe
Itumeleng lotlhe ka Thobo x2

Basetsana, itumeleng lotlhe
Basimane, itumeleng lotlhe
Itumeleng lotlhe ka Thobo x2

Bomme, itumeleng lotlhe
Borrare, itumeleng lotlhe
Itumeleng lotlhe ka Thobo x2

KA BOSAKUTLENG
Malatsi a pina e opelwang ka one:
• Mo tirelong ya Thobo ka Tshipi mo mosong go amogelwa bana ba fentseng ditlhatlhobo tsa go tlholwa
